Stoneyridge.default_windows: Experimental Windows support. Requires patched drivers with testsigning enabled.

Picasso/Dali.default_linux: Needs to add "iommu=pt" to kernel parameters

AMD Mendocino.default_linux: A recent kernel (6.8+) is needed for headphones to work.
